headline: Is Axon (AXON) Trading Near-Term EPS Pressure for a Deeper AI Software Advantage?
summary: Axon Enterprise recently faced pressure as investors weighed expectations for a double-digit earnings-per-share decline against forecasts for continued revenue growth, all while the company advances its transition toward AI-enabled public safety software such as Draft One and Axon 911. The tension between Axon’s investment in AI-driven platforms and questions about how quickly those initiatives may support profitability has become a central issue for investors assessing its evolving business...

headline: Assessing Axon Enterprise (AXON) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Axon Enterprise stock overview Axon Enterprise (AXON) has drawn fresh attention after a stretch of weaker share performance, including a 10% decline over the past week and a 26% decline in the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Axon Enterprise. Those moves come after a tougher stretch, with a 1-year total shareholder return decline of 14.08% and a 3-year total shareholder return above 7x. Recent share price momentum appears to be fading from a much stronger longer-term run. If Axon’s...

headline: AppLovin's ad tech business could steal Amazon's lunch
summary: Wall Street remains wary of the black box behind AppLovin's AI, but early data suggest its e-commerce pivot is already eating into Amazon's territory.
